hero.title: Join our cause!
hero.description: We help develop social impact projects, organize workshops, hackathons and podcasts. Train other students and schools. Learn from experts and outstanding graduates. Be part of the change today.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Promote digital inclusion through community collaboration by providing technological tools, training, and support to the people and organizations who need it most.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be a benchmark in digital solidarity transformation in Latin America, building bridges between technological knowledge and communities to create lasting social impact.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Solidarity, purposeful technology, open education, equity, cultural respect.

about.title: Who are we?
about.description: We are a group of volunteers committed to [state mission]. Since [start year], we have worked on projects in [action areas].

founders.title: Our Founders
founders.subtitle: Meet the minds behind our mission to create a positive impact in the community

description.founder: Passionate about technology and social impact. Over 10 years of experience in software development.
description.cofounder: Expert in software architecture and technical leadership. Committed to innovation and sustainable development.
description.director: Specialist in innovation and technological project development. Focused on creating solutions that generate social impact.
description.advisor: Expert in digital strategy and technological transformation. Committed to developing innovative solutions for the social sector.

projects.title: From Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Learn how we are growing and making an impact with our projects.

a.title: Boosting AI in the community
a.description: A look at how our AI workshops are empowering the next generation of innovators.

b.title: The impact of digital volunteering
b.description: Discover how collaboration and technology can transform entire communities from within.

c.title: Accessible education for all
c.description: Our mission to bring technological knowledge to rural areas and the impact it has generated.

d.title: Creating collaborative networks
d.description: The importance of building bridges between organizations to maximize social impact.

e.title: The future of social work and tech
e.description: We explore the trends that will define the next decade of technological volunteering.

queHacemos.title: What do we do?
queHacemos.subtitle: We are a volunteer group dedicated to driving digital transformation and social development through technology and collaboration. We organize workshops, training, community projects, and impact activities to improve people's lives and strengthen the social fabric.

activities.descripcion: We conducted an introductory workshop on AI for young people in the community, covering everything from basic concepts to practical real-world applications.
We collaborate on social and technological projects for local development, joining forces to create a positive and lasting impact.

convocatoria.title: Volunteer Call
convocatoria.subtitle: Complete the form to apply as a volunteer at Ayni Digital.
convocatoria.motivo: Why do you want to be a volunteer?
convocatoria.experiencia_previa: Do you have previous volunteer experience?
